title: Offenses
content:
Major offenses

  • Trolling and vandalism
  • Profane, violent or offensive content
  • A willful pervertion of facts, deliberately making confusion, making false statements
  • Ill-intent propaganda and radicalization
contentPreview:
Major offenses

 * Trolling and vandalism
 * Profane, violent or offensive content
 * A willful pervertion of facts, deliberately making confusion, making false statements
 * Ill-intent propaganda and radicalization
